display.title: Slurry Processing
description: Some Gem ores - namely &&cRuby&&r, &&9Sapphire&&r, and &&2Green Sapphire&&r - can be mixed with Aqua Regia in their crushed form to obtain Slurry.
When electrolysed, the Slurry has some interesting byproducts. Namely, it's one of the few ways to obtain &&dTitanium Dust&&r without macerating Titanium ingots!
